text: Posting Gnarly Space Facts Until I Run Out of Knowledge  Day   You know the drill  Or maybe you don t  You ll figure it out though  If you have any questions about space OR if you have a topic you d like to see me do a space fact on  lemme know  See you tomorrow    Fact  NASA s Parker Solar Probe will soon be the single fastest man made object ever built  It is a probe launched in   designed to study the outer corona of the Sun  So far  it has been in solar orbit for a little over   years  and has already gotten closer to the Sun than any artificial object  To get this close to our star  it uses gravity assists at Venus to slowly decrease its  perihelion   the point at which it is the closest to the Sun  Currently  that perihelion is about   million kilometres   million miles  above the surface of the Sun  That may seem like a lot  but it s actually only   the distance between the Earth and the Sun  Eventually  the multiple gravity assists that the Parker Solar Probe performs will have slowed it down so much that its perihelion will get all the way down to a final altitude of just   million kilometres   million miles  When it reaches this point  the gravity from the Sun at perihelion will be so intense that the little probe will be slingshot up to a speed of   kilometres per hour  That is   the speed of light  This absolutely destroys the previous record of a wimpy   kph  set by the Helios   solar probe back in   Parker Solar Probe s mission will continue until at least   but it has already left its mark in space history
summary: Parker Solar Probe will soon be the fastest man-made object ever built. It was launched to study the outer corona of the Sun. It has been in solar orbit for a little over years and has already gotten closer to the Sun than any artificial object. It uses gravity assists at Venus to decrease its perihelion.
cleaned: parker solar probe soon fast man object build launch study outer corona sun solar orbit little year get close sun artificial object use gravity assist venus decrease perihelion

text: Never able to please my parentsThis will be a mess but I cant do this anymore  Every time I attempt anything I fail  My family has a delusion that I m smart   Then they call me a monster  a bitch  lazy  an asshole  a dumbass  a McDonald s employee  stupid  etc  when I inevitably fail  They call me an asshole for not thinking that material objects equals love  They call me a bitch for not wanting to talk  be insulted and belittled  to them  They ll hit me and when I defend myself I m told I started attacking them  They get mad for me not being this fantasy in their head  They get angry when told I don t wanna go to college  end up in debt and have a useless degree and work at some boring job I used to love  I mean love love science  Figuring out how and why the universe worked  Now I can barely stand it  We can t afford college  but I still have to go  The only way is to win a scholarship  But I can t  There others who actually want and deserve thise scolarships and college  There are those who can change the world  But I m not one of those people  Why is that so hard to accept   Everything I do is wrong  My passions are wrong  My height is wrong  My dreams are wrong  Me friends are wrong  My aspirations are wrong  My ideas are wrong  My art style is wrong  My mental capacity is wrong  My opinions are wrong  Fuck even the way I play Minecraft is wrong If everything is wrong why can t I die  I ve tried and failed before  Everything I do fails  God I just want an end already
summary: Every time I try to do something I fail, I'm called a monster, a bitch, lazy, an idiot, a dumbass, a McDonald's employee, a Minecraft player, and an idiot by my parents. I used to love science, but I can't afford college. The only way I can win a scholarship is to go to college and change the world.
